comments:
Create a connection holding the developer subsystem. Create a new filter within that subsystem. Refresh the filter - get an NPE.

The NPE is caused by failing to resolved getObjectWithAbsoluteName. The absolute name is constructed by an adapter SystemViewFilterReferenceAdapter rather than an adapter associated with the subsystem.

I believe this may be symptomatic of a larger problem where users construct their own subsystems so I have marked this major. At the very least we should be  tolerant of failures to provide proper information to the framework. In addition, the stack trace is printed on the console rather than to the log.

Here is the stack trace:

This was already fixed.  For the refresh stuff, we don't attempt to reget non-remote objects now.
